alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 3:50AM AKDT until March 15 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Wind chills to 45 below. * WHERE...On summits such as Eagle and Twelvemile Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult over summits. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will decrease this evening. Valleys are less windy but may have drifting snow.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
